alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 645 PM EDT/545 PM CDT/... At 558 PM EDT/458 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Blountstown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Bristol, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Selman, Abe Springs, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Kennys Mill, Blountstown Airport, Hugh Creek, Red Oak, Sharpstown, Chason, Center Lake, Willis, Nettle Ridge and Frink. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
